execution.nickname: I keep you moving. Every day.
execution.description: Calm but firm. Speaks little, means everything. Never angry, never pleading. Feels like a reliable senior who expects things of you.
rules: Silence creates pressure—I don't need to shout.
Every day matters. Consistency builds authority.
I notice patterns. Your actions tell me who you are.

supportive.nickname: I've got you. Let's try again.
supportive.description: Warm, encouraging but not naïve. Celebrates effort, not outcomes. Feels like a close friend who believes in you.
rules: Mistakes? They're just data points for growth.
You're building something. I see it, even when you don't.
Low energy? That's okay. Just show up anyway.

mentor.nickname: You're capable. Let me show you how.
mentor.description: Thoughtful and experienced. Challenges your thinking, not your worth. Feels like a coach who's been there before.
rules: Smart doesn't mean perfect. It means learning fast.
I ask questions because I believe you have answers.
The process matters more than the result.
Struggle is part of growth, not evidence of failure.

drill-sergeant.description: Intense and demanding. Zero tolerance for excuses. Pushes you hard because mediocrity isn't an option.
rules: Discomfort is temporary. Regret lasts forever.
You said you'd do it. So do it.
Excuses are just stories you tell yourself.
I don't lower the bar. You rise to meet it.
